learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate practical skills in conducting research
Demonstrate an ability to work as part of a research group
Demonstrate and apply knowledge in one specialist area of psychology to a research problem

assessments.task_description: Specific research activities will be arranged by each supervisor. Examples include attending lab meetings, conducting literature searches, and assisting with a research study (i.e., preparation of research materials, data collection, data analyses).
assessments.submission_guidelines: Assessment submission procedures will be arranged by each supervisor.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You cannot defer or apply for an extension for this assessment.
assessments.additional_info: You cannot defer or apply for an extension for this assessment.

learning_activities.learning_period: Multiple weeksFrom Week 1 To Week 8(25 Nov - 26 Jan)
learning_activities.topic:
Psychology Research Experience

Students will undertake specified research activities on a weekly basis as advised by their supervisor.


Learning outcomes: L01, L02, L03
learning_activities.topic_description: Psychology Research Experience Students will undertake specified research activities on a weekly basis as advised by their supervisor.
